humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, one out of 17 assessed lymph nodes is positive for metastasis (Sentinel 1/17). Based on the new rules provided, N1 indicates metastases in 1 to 3 axillary lymph nodes. Therefore, the N stage for this patient's cancer is N1.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient has 1/17 positive lymph nodes for metastasis, which indicates that the cancer has spread to at least one axillary lymph node. This corresponds to a pathologic N1 stage. The absence of extracapsular invasion and clear margins are also consistent with this stage.
